solution_line_template: Nadine spent ${total_spent} - ${table_cost} for the table = $<<{total_spent}-{table_cost}={cost_on_chairs}>>{cost_on_chairs} on chairs.
The cost of the chairs was equal, so one chair cost ${cost_on_chairs} / {number_of_chairs} = $<<{cost_on_chairs}/{number_of_chairs}={cost_per_chair}>>{cost_per_chair}.
